about_the_game:
Lawless is a gripping action-thriller that immerses players in the raw and untamed landscapes of rural India, where every choice carries weight, and the line between justice and vengeance blurs. Step into a world of power, betrayal, and survival as you navigate the violent underbelly of a society torn by crime and corruption.

Lawless is inspired by the raw and vivid life of India—a land where the scenery shifts dramatically, from sprawling farmlands to dense forests and chaotic village bazaars. One moment, you witness serene landscapes, and the next, you're thrust into the violent world of the mafia. This is a land where life hides as much as it reveals.

The story of Lawless revolves around the village named Laalmati—a land of power, survival, and untamed beauty. With Lawless, you’ll delve into this world in all its rawness and mystery, exploring different eras of gameplay, an adrenaline-fueled story line, and an open-world map that captures the essence of India's countryside.

The game features an action-packed story line with third-person gameplay. Engage in intense shootouts, travel across evolving environments, and make choices that define your path. Beyond the gripping story, you’ll find yourself uncovering secrets, forging alliances, and battling enemies to carve your destiny.

Explore a compelling narrative with a strong, determined protagonist who must face personal demons and impossible odds to confront a corrupt world. Step into Lawless, a game where you play as a mysterious protagonist navigating a treacherous landscape of power struggles and betrayal, along with various other key characters of the story. From surviving the streets to challenging the throne of the mafia underworld, this open-world action-adventure game puts you in control of your destiny.

Immerse yourself in moments of calm when you're not on missions. Discover rural India's vibrant culture through unique activities spread across the area—playing soccer and cricket, going fishing, taking a night swim under the soft moon, interacting with locals at bustling markets, and much more.

Experience the thrill of combat and the heartache of moral dilemmas. Encounter criminals, mafia bosses, and powerful players in a story that blends intense action with deep character development.

Come, witness a story of love, loss and violence and experience India like never before in Lawless.

content_descriptors.notes: Lawless contains strong language, intense violence, blood and gore, use of alcohol, drugs, as well as some nudity and mention of sexual material.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 (4 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 380 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible

short_description: An intense third-person action-adventure set in rural India. Engage in brutal combat, explore a vibrant and raw open world while navigating a gripping narrative of power, survival, and moral choices.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
